00036 // Macro allowing use of pandora monitoring to be quickly included/excluded via pre-processor flag
00037 #ifdef MONITORING
00038     #define PANDORA_MONITORING_API(command)                                                                 \
00039     if (PandoraSettings::IsMonitoringEnabled())                                                             \
00040     {                                                                                                       \
00041         PandoraMonitoringApi::command;                                                                      \
00042     }
00043 #else
00044     #define PANDORA_MONITORING_API(command)
00045 #endif

00049 // Macros for registering lists of algorithms, energy corrections functions, particle id functions or settings functions
00050 #define PANDORA_REGISTER_ALGORITHM(a, b)                                                                    \
00051 {                                                                                                           \
00052     const pandora::StatusCode statusCode(PandoraApi::RegisterAlgorithmFactory(pandora, a, new b));          \
00053     if (pandora::STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS != statusCode)                                                         \
00054         return statusCode;                                                                                  \
00055 }
00056 
00057 #define PANDORA_REGISTER_ENERGY_CORRECTION(a, b, c)                                                         \
00058 {                                                                                                           \
00059     const pandora::StatusCode statusCode(PandoraApi::RegisterEnergyCorrectionFunction(pandora, a, b, c));   \
00060     if (pandora::STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS != statusCode)                                                         \
00061         return statusCode;                                                                                  \
00062 }
00063 
00064 #define PANDORA_REGISTER_PARTICLE_ID(a, b)                                                                  \
00065 {                                                                                                           \
00066     const pandora::StatusCode statusCode(PandoraApi::RegisterParticleIdFunction(pandora, a, b));            \
00067     if (pandora::STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS != statusCode)                                                         \
00068         return statusCode;                                                                                  \
00069 }
00070 
00071 #define PANDORA_REGISTER_SETTINGS(a, b)                                                                     \
00072 {                                                                                                           \
00073     const pandora::StatusCode statusCode(PandoraApi::RegisterSettingsFunction(pandora, a, b));              \
00074     if (pandora::STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS != statusCode)                                                         \
00075         return statusCode;                                                                                  \
00076 }

00079 
00080 template <class T>
00081 inline bool StringToType(const std::string &s, T &t)
00082 {
00083     std::istringstream iss(s);
00084     return !(iss >> t).fail();
00085 }
00086 
00087 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 
00090 template <class T>
00091 inline std::string TypeToString(const T &t)
00092 {
00093     std::ostringstream oss;
00094 
00095     if ((oss << t).fail())
00096         throw;
00097 
00098     return oss.str();
00099 }

00107 template <typename T>
00108 class PointerLessThan
00109 {
00110 public:
00111     bool operator()(const T *lhs, const T *rhs) const;
00112 };
00113 
00114 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00115 
00116 template <typename T>
00117 inline bool PointerLessThan<T>::operator()(const T *lhs, const T *rhs) const
00118 {
00119     return (*lhs < *rhs);
00120 }
